mapper.select: SELECT * from t_board START WITH parentNO=0 CONNECT BY PRIOR articleNO=parentNO ORDER SIBLINGS BY articleNO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT into t_board(articleNO, parentNO, title, writedate, content, imageFileName, member_no) VALUES(#{articleNO}, #{parentNO}, #{title}, sysdate, #{content}, #{imageFileName},#{member_no})
mapper.delete: delete from t_board where articleNO in ( SELECT articleNO FROM t_board START WITH articleNO = #{articleNO} CONNECT BY PRIOR articleNO = parentNO )
